alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Natrona County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 27 at 1:42PM MDT until September 28 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 280...289 and 300. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * WIND: West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 13 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the upper 70s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Natrona County, Casper BLM
